entry_headline: INTERNATIONALLY RENOWNED ARTIST, WRITER AND COMPOSER IVA DAVIES OF ICEHOUSE INKS DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: Upon announcing the new deal with Kobalt, Davies said: "I'm really excited about the prospect of being involved with Kobalt as I move to the next phase of my career," said Iva, "Having only been with one publisher throughout my career this was a big step to make. What impressed me most was the Kobalt team's new and different way of approaching publishing: their transparency, enthusiasm and creativity sees them firmly engaged in new models for the 21st century in order to benefit the writers and artists they work with."

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP EXPANDS BUSINESS BEYOND PUBLISHING: NEW GLOBAL MULTIPLE RIGHTS PLATFORM TO LAUNCH

entry_headline: JUSTIN HAWKINS SIGNS WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH KOBALT MUSIC
entry_abstract: Hawkins says: "Kobalt and I have been flirting for some months. It was only a matter of time before the relationship escalated. We're together now and I don't care who knows it."

entry_headline: GRAMMY NOMINATED PRODUCER / WRITER GREG WELLS INKS WITH LEADING INDIE PUBLISHER KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: As part of the announcement, Wells said: "I feel fortunate to be able to partner with such a cutting edge company. Kobalt offers something no other music publisher can, between the creative team and the speed and transparency of royalty collection. After careful consideration of all options, Kobalt was the only choice for me."

entry_headline: KID CUDI SIGNS EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE ADMINISTRATION DEAL
entry_abstract: New Mark Wahlberg produced HBO series, How To Make It In America, features new Kobalt client Kid Cudi (aka Scott Mescudi) in recurring role.

entry_headline: KOBALT INTRODUCES FULL TRANSPARENCY FOR DIGITAL REVENUE COLLECTIONS, GLOBAL FILM AND TV PRODUCTIONS
entry_abstract: The Kobalt Client Portal will offer unprecedented access to detailed information on collections in digital music sales and performance royalties and other digital revenue streams. Additionally the system will offer expanded access to data on products tracked and audio visual performance royalties collected from licensed content in global film and TV productions.

entry_headline: GLOBAL SUPERSTAR DJ TIËSTO SIGNS EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: The new deal covers new works by Tiësto, including the new radio single, "Feel It," by Three 6 Mafia featuring Tiësto, Sean Kingston and Flo Rida. Kobalt additionally is representing Tiësto's latest release, Kaleidoscope (Ultra Records).

entry_headline: KOBALT CONCLUDES ADMINISTRATION DEAL WITH INTERNATIONAL HITMAKING PRODUCER ARNTHOR BIRGISSON AND ARI
entry_abstract: Kobalt Music Group has concluded a new administration deal with top Swedish producer/songwriter Arnthor Birgisson

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC FOUNDER AND CEO WILLARD AHDRITZ WINS BVCA VENTURE CAPITAL BACKED CEO OF THE YEAR AWARD
entry_abstract: At the ceremony in London, Ahdritz, who founded Kobalt Music Group and conceived the original Kobalt business concept in 2001, was recognised for his leadership of the emerging global music publishing company which has formed its unique service-based business model around a transparent, automated and centralised, online administration service which collects between 10-50% more income for clients up to 2.5 times faster.

entry_headline: HITMAKING SONGWRITER / PRODUCER AND ARTIST DARRELL BROWN SIGNS EXCLUSIVE DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: With repertoire responsible for more than 70 million units sold worldwide, Kobalt's new client Darrell Brown has worked with a who's who in the industry including Neil Young, LeAnn Rimes, Keith Urban, Bon Jovi, Faith Hill, Brooks and Dunn, Dolly Parton, Wilson Phillips, Trace Adkins, Michael McDonald, Take 6, Kenny Loggins, Hall and Oates, John Farhnam, Smokey Robinson, Radney Foster, among others.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP SIGNS EXCLUSIVE WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH BUSTA RHYMES
entry_abstract: "We chose Kobalt not only for their competitive deal structure and fully transparent, online accounting system, but also because the team at Kobalt is knowledgeable, experienced and extremely involved and aggressive -- all the key elements we were looking for in our publisher. We're very happy to be here," said Mona Scott-Young, manager of Busta Rhymes.

entry_headline: DAVE STEWART SIGNS WITH KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: As one of the most respected and accomplished artists, producers and songwriters in modern music, Dave Stewart has made yet another revolutionary turn and opted to sign a new worldwide deal with Kobalt.

entry_headline: KELLY CLARKSON SIGNS GLOBAL ADMINISTRATION DEAL WITH KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: Pop superstar Kelly Clarkson has chosen Kobalt as her exclusive worldwide publishing administration company. Kobalt to represent Clarkson for a wide array of creative/A&R, and synch licensing opportunities.

entry_headline: NAT GEO MUSIC SIGNS EXCLUSIVE GLOBAL PUBLISHING DEAL WITH KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: In Cannes, France it was announced that National Geographic Entertainment tapped kobalt to provide global administration for its growing music division Nat Geo Music.

entry_headline: KOBALT SIGNS EXCLUSIVE ADMINISTRATION DEAL WITH KID ROCK
entry_abstract: He ruled charts "All Summer Long" and then multi-million selling superstar Kid Rock signed with Kobalt to administer the worldwide publishing rights of his No. 1 album, Rock N Roll Jesus (Top Dog/Atlantic).

entry_headline: KOBALT PRESENTS NASHVILLE PREVIEW OF THE MOST ADVANCED ONLINE MUSIC PUBLISHING ADMINISTRATION SYSTEM
entry_abstract: Dennis Matkosky, Grammy award-winning songwriter says, "Kobalt's admin technology and that aspect of their business is very important to me, but more importantly, I would hang out with these people...They have a great creative team... It's the best of both worlds!"

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP SIGNS DEAL WITH POWERHOUSE PRODUCER / WRITER NATE “DANJA” HILLS
entry_abstract: Danja says: "They are a future thinking company with innovative ideas which matches my own approach to music and the business that surrounds it."

entry_headline: GETTY IMAGES AND KOBALT CONCLUDE EXCLUSIVE GLOBAL ADMINISTRATION DEAL AND STRATEGIC LICENSING PACT
entry_abstract: Kobalt to provide exclusive, worldwide administration services for Getty Images global music catalog.

entry_headline: A FIRST FOR THE MUSIC INDUSTRY – KOBALT DEBUTS ONLINE PIPELINE ROYALTY ADVANCES
entry_abstract: Commemorating Kobalt's new technology launch Mark Beaven, CEO and Owner of AAM, said: "Their new Online Pipeline Royalty Advances steps the game up a whole 'nother level. This will enable writers to, at-a-glance, better and more easily identify, as well as control, their publishing's financial picture while immediately interfacing it with their direct financial needs. Can you say '3-click cash'? Thought you could."

entry_headline: KOBALT SIGNS NEW DEAL WITH TOP SWEDISH METAL ACT IN FLAMES
entry_abstract: Highly influential Swedish metal band comes to Kobalt via an exclusive agreement struck with its services company, Whoracle Publishing.

entry_headline: BALDERTON CAPITAL INVESTS IN LEADING INDEPENDENT MUSIC PUBLISHER KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: New capital to fuel Kobalt expansion of services and successful service model.

entry_headline: KOBALT CONCLUDES NEW DEAL WITH ELECTRONIC/POP SUPERSTAR MOBY
entry_abstract: Moby signed an exclusive, worldwide administration deal with Kobalt to administer his next album, Last Night (Mute/EMI), which is described as "smiley-faced rave anthems, cosmic Giorgio Moroder-styled Euro disco, old school and underground hip-hop, and downtempo/end-of the-night ambience." The record features guest vocalists including the original 70's MC, Grandmaster Caz, one of the writers of The Sugarhill Gang's "Rappers Delight," Sylvia from Kudu, the UK's MC Aynzli and the Nigerian 419 Crew.

entry_headline: KOBALT CONCLUDES NEW DEAL TO ADMINISTER SEMINAL FUNK CATALOG – BRIDGEPORT MUSIC WESTBOUND RECORDS
entry_abstract: A "Sample Goldmine" - The Bridgeport-Westbound catalog administered by Kobalt features thousands of song classics features chart-topping hits of George Clinton, Parliament Funkadelic and The Ohio Players, among many others.

entry_headline: RYAN ”ALIAS” TEDDER – WRITER/PRODUCER OF LEONA LEWIS’ NO. 1 – “BLEEDING LOVE” SIGNS WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: Kobalt has signed a worldwide administration deal with emerging superstar Ryan "Alias" Tedder, co-writer/producer for multiple No.1s. The deal includes representation of Tedder's new works, excluding songs performed by the band One Republic, of which he is the lead singer.

entry_headline: EIGHT MILE STYLE MUSIC AND KOBALT ANNOUNCE GROUNDBREAKING MUSIC PUBLISHING AND TECHNOLOGY PACT
entry_abstract: Through the new deal, Music Resources to execlusively debut "Powered By Kobalt" Services Brand.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC INKS GLOBAL DEAL WITH NUMBER 1 POP WRITER SHELLY PEIKEN
entry_abstract: As part of Kobalt's new deal with hitmaker Peiken, the company will represent her works for synchronization including films, TV, advertising, ringtones, and other media.

entry_headline: HERBERT GRONEMEYER SIGNS EXCLUSIVE DEAL WITH KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: Multi-million selling German pop superstar, Herbert Grönemeyer, chooses Kobalt to administer his entire Grönland Musikverlag catalogue.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP ANNOUNCES GROUNDBREAKING ROYALTY ADVANCE PRODUCT FOR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS
entry_abstract: Revolutionary new Kobalt pipeline royalty advance product allows songwriters and rights holders low cost access to money while still retaining ownership.

entry_headline: GWEN STEFANI WINDS UP A NEW DEAL WITH KOBALT - POP ICON RENEWS EX-NORTH AMERICAN ADMINISTRATION DEAL
entry_abstract: On the heels of the release of her second solo set, The Sweet Escape (Interscope), the global superstar singer-songwriter and fashion icon reupped with Kobalt.

entry_headline: KOBALT SIGNS WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH PETER SVENSSON AND NINA PERSSON OF THE CARDIGANS
entry_abstract: Kobalt to represent Svensson's and Persson's works on The Cardigans' new album, Super Extra Gravity (Nettwerk).

entry_headline: POP MUSIC ICON AND SONGWRITER BARRY MANILOW SIGNS EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE PUBLISHING DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: Kobalt will provide creative services and administrate Manilow's future works as well as seventy-five songs in his Obbligato Music (ASCAP) catalog.

entry_headline: MATISYAHU’S JOSH WERNER SIGNS WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: New Kobalt client and Matisyahu bass player Josh Werner co-wrote the chart-topping singles "King Without A Crown" and "Youth."

entry_headline: PRODUCER/WRITER RHETT LAWRENCE CONCLUDES EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE PACT WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: The deal includes all of Lawrence's Rhettrhyme back catalog, as well as current and future material under his Rhettski publishing catalog.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP SIGNS LEGENDARY POP SONGWRITER BILLY STEINBERG
entry_abstract: New Kobalt client Steinberg co-wrote massive pop hits (with Tom Kelly) such as "Like a Virgin" (Madonna), "True Colors" (Cyndi Lauper), "Eternal Flame" (The Bangles), "I Drove All Night" (Cyndi Lauper, Roy Orbison, Celine Dion), "I'll Stand By You" (The Pretenders), "Alone" (Heart), "I Touch Myself" (Divinyls) and "So Emotional" (Whitney Houston).

entry_headline: FIFA SIGNS KOBALT AS EXCLUSIVE WORLDWIDE ADMINISTRATOR FOR THE OFFICIAL MELODY OF THE 2006 WORLD CUP
entry_abstract: The company is exploiting content for FIFA globally through Kobalt's digital distribution partners on five continents.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP SIGNS THE VERVE’S EPIC FRONTMAN RICHARD ASHCROFT
entry_abstract: Kobalt will represent Ashcroft's third solo album, Keys To The World (Parlophone), which debuted in the U.K. Top 10.

entry_headline: KOBALT MUSIC GROUP SIGNS EXCLUSIVE ADMINISTRATION DEAL WITH EVERGREEN COPYRIGHT ACQUISITIONS
entry_abstract: Administration deal for publisher covers the world ex-U.S., Canada and China.

entry_headline: KOBALT NAMES HITMAKER DESMOND CHILD AS AMBASSADOR AND SPOKESEMAN TO THE PRODUCER SONGWRITER
entry_abstract: Veteran hitmaker Child signs with Kobalt. Child has penned major hits for Bon Jovi, Aerosmith, Ricky Martin, Cher, Michael Bolton among others.

entry_headline: KOBALT SIGNS MERCURY PRIZE WINNER ANTONY HEGARTY OF ANTONY & THE JOHNSONS
entry_abstract: New signing Hegarty won the 2005 Mercury Prize, ahead of such major acts as Coldplay and Kaiser Chiefs.

entry_headline: MULTI-PLATINUM CONTRY SUPERSTAR TOBY KEITH SIGNS WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: New deal includes administration of Keith's entire DreamWorks catalog and future works (ex-NA and Canada).

entry_headline: SWEDISH ROCK BAND THE HIVES SIGN EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH KOBALT MUSIC GROUP
entry_abstract: Says The Hives: "Someone is doing something right and it is not only The Hives this time. So we wish The Hives as well as you Kobalt all the luck in the world with all of your doings and look forward to another year of ruling in the music industry."

entry_headline: LUKAZ "DR. LUKE" GOTTWALD SIGNS EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: New Kobalt client Dr. Luke co-wrote and produced both of Kelly Clarkson's No. 1 U.S. hits "Since You've Been Gone" and "Behind These Hazel Eyes"

entry_headline: NINE INCH NAILS SIGNS ADMINISTRATION DEAL WITH KOBALT
entry_abstract: Kobalt to represent new album, plus back catalog (selected territories) as well as NIN future works.

entry_headline: KOBALT SIGNS GWEN STEFANI
entry_abstract: Global superstar singer, fashion icon and No Doubt front woman signs exclusive, ex-North America deal
